imdb.title: Kyô kara maô!
imdb.plot: After being flushed down a toilet, 15-year-old Yuuri Shibuya is transported to an alternate world called the New Demon Kingdom, and is told that he is to be the new king of the demons. Helped by four of his subjects, Conrad Weller...

episodes.title: Nagasarete isekai
episodes.plot: Yuri Shibuya is flushed down a toilet into an alternate world where he meets new people and discovers important information about himself.

episodes.title: Duel! Pretty Boy vs. Baseball Boy
episodes.plot: Yuuri attends a dinner party and meets more of the people who will make up his subjects. He accidentally challenges Conrart's brother, Wolfram, to a duel.

episodes.title: Yuri Shibuya! I Am the Demon King!
episodes.plot: Yuri and Wolfram sneak off to participate in a skirmish in a human village without anyone knowing.

episodes.title: Now It's the Ultimate Weapon?!
episodes.plot: We receive flashbacks of Yuri's parents and his birth. Yuri returns to Shin Makoku and faces a tough decision concerning war.

episodes.title: The Sailor and the Spoiled Brat
episodes.plot: Yuri sets out on a ship with Conrad and Wolfram to obtain the legendary sword Morgif to aid him in preventing war with the humans.

episodes.title: The Terror of Morgif, the Man-Eating Demon-Sword?
episodes.plot: Yuri, Conrad, Wolfram, and Josak arrive on the island and begin searching for Morgif, the powerful demon-sword that feeds off of human lives.
